work.summary: I am a certified geeksquad agent for Best Buy in Honolulu
highlights: Provides technical support and services related to various technology products and devices.
Assist customers with technology-related issues, including troubleshooting, repairs, installations, and consultations.

work.summary: Responsible for welcoming customers, taking orders, processing payments, and ensuring that customers have a pleasant and satisfying dining experience.
highlights: work closely with kitchen staff and managers to ensure that orders are prepared correctly and efficiently.
upsell menu items or promote special offers to customers, contributing to increased sales and revenue for the restaurant.
